trans-unit.note: This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.
This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Static templates are a centrally distributed TypoScript library. You should never change these values.
trans-unit.target: Statiska mallar är ett TypoScript bibliotek, som distribueras centraliserat. Du ska aldrig ändra dessa värden.

trans-unit.source: Description of the static template record.

The Static templates are meant to be included by your TypoScript Template records depending on your needs. Refer to the 'TSref' document (see below) for details on this process. Notice that by each release of TYPO3 you should reinstall the Static Templates table by the install tool. See the 'Install/Upgrade' document for details (see below).
trans-unit.target:
De statiska mallarna är tänkta att inkluderas i dina TypoScript-mallar beroende på dina behov. Läs mera om hur det fungerar i TSref-dokumentet (se nedan).
Notera att du i samband med varje utgåva av TYPO3 skall ominstallera de statiska malltabellerna via installationsverktyget. För mera information, läs 'Installera/Uppgradera'-dokumentet (se nedan).

trans-unit.source: Editor Configuration - used to configure Stylesheet editor.
trans-unit.target: Editeringskonfiguration - används för att konfigurera Stylesheet-editeraren.

trans-unit.note: This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.

trans-unit.source: The static templates are located in the page tree root where only the Admin users can access them. However they are read-only by default so you can only look at their content, not change it.
trans-unit.target: De statiska mallarna finns i sidträdets rot där endast Admin-användare har åtkomst till dem. De är som standard skrivskyddade så du kan bara se på deras innehåll, inte ändra dem.

trans-unit.source: sys_template TSref | https://docs.typo3.org/typo3cms/TyposcriptReference/ TypoScript in 45 min| https://docs.typo3.org/typo3cms/TyposcriptIn45MinutesTutorial/ Install/Upgrade | https://docs.typo3.org/typo3cms/InstallationGuide/, sys_template:include_static
Template Title. Will be visible in the list of static templates in Template Records
trans-unit.target: Mallrubrik. Visas i listan med statiska mallar.
